concept.title: Preparation & Things to Know Before Use
concept.shortdesc: It's very important that we treat our ice cream machine with care so it lasts and is available for our next fellow ice cream enthusiasts to enjoy. Here are some simple tips to ensure the longevity and effectiveness of the machine.

conbody.p: 1) Do NOT at any point immerse the motor base in water. The preferred cleaning method is wiping it thoroughly with a moist cloth, or ost likely in our case, a paper towel.
2) Before the machine's first use, wash the lid, freezer bowl and mixing arm in soapy water to ensure its cleanliness and riddance of all residue from the manufacturing and shipping process.

3) The freezer bowl is a very important component for the product making process. The bowl must be completely frozen before we begin making our recipes. Itâ€™s a necessity that we keep the bowl in the freezer located in the kitchen at the end of the room at all times when not in use. For the best results, the Bowl must be frozen for 12-24 hours. Make sure to wash and dry the bowl after each individual use.
